alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 14 at 6:16PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jackson County through 715 PM CST... At 615 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wade, or 10 miles north of Escatawpa, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocean Springs, Moss Point, Escatawpa, Gautier, Wade, Helena, Gulf Hills, Hurley, Big Point, Vancleave, Gulf Park Estates and Hickory Hills. This includes Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 51 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for southern Mississippi.
